Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is much more accessible so it allowed me to get responses quick and at really early/late times in the day. This allows me to get straight onto improving the work rather than waiting for a response.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I did not notice a difference in how i felt

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers will give you feedback and then explain why that feedback is helpful.
